mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: David, J. B. A. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: David, J. B. A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 4 1861 By Telegraph from Clarksburg 4 1861 A telegram in cipher has been sent me from Washington for you it should reach you in cipher Has Mr. Carlile a Key & shall I send to him JBA David
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: David, J. B. A.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
